entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
